alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:31PM EDT until July 18 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Northeastern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Vienna, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Greenfield, Leesburg, New Vienna, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Highland, Rocky Fork Lake, East Monroe, Samantha, Rainsboro and Paint Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
